languages.text: "Я возмущен{mf||а}, что столь почтенные и важные члены экипажа ходят в обносках! Немедленно отправить им новые одежды, вина и яств!"
"I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"
languages.original_text: "Я возмущен{mf||а}, что столь почтенные и важные члены экипажа ходят в обносках! Немедленно отправить им новые одежды, вина и яств!"

traits.locale_text: "I find it outrageous that such respectable and important members of my crew are wearing tatters! Send them new garments, wine, and victuals at once!"
"I find it outrageous that such respectable and important members of my crew are wearing tatters! Send them new garments, wine, and victuals at once!"
"I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"
"I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"
"I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"
"I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"

languages.text: « Il est proprement scandaleux que des membres aussi importants de mon équipage soient vêtus de pareils haillons ! Qu'on leur donne de la nourriture, du vin, et des vêtements neufs sur-le-champ ! »
languages.original_text: "I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"

traits.locale_text: « Il est proprement scandaleux que des membres aussi importants de mon équipage soient vêtus de pareils haillons ! Qu'on leur donne de la nourriture, du vin, et des vêtements neufs sur-le-champ ! »

languages.text: «¡Es intolerable que miembros tan importantes de mi tripulación se vistan con andrajos! ¡Recibirán comida, vino y ropa nueva de inmediato!».
languages.original_text: "I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Es intolerable que miembros tan importantes de mi tripulación se vistan con andrajos! ¡Recibirán comida, vino y ropa nueva de inmediato!».

languages.text: “这些人都是我重要的船员，居然穿得这么破破烂烂，这简直是骇人听闻！马上给他们准备食物和酒，还有新的衣服！”
languages.original_text: "I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"

traits.locale_text: “这些人都是我重要的船员，居然穿得这么破破烂烂，这简直是骇人听闻！马上给他们准备食物和酒，还有新的衣服！”

languages.text: 「このような重要なクルーがボロを着ているのは言語道断だ！すぐに食事とワインを与え、新しい衣服に着替えさせろ！今すぐにだ！」
languages.original_text: "I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"

traits.locale_text: 「このような重要なクルーがボロを着ているのは言語道断だ！すぐに食事とワインを与え、新しい衣服に着替えさせろ！今すぐにだ！」

languages.text: "Ich finde es unerhört, dass solch wichtige Mitglieder meiner Crew in Lumpen gekleidet sind! Gebt ihnen unverzüglich Essen, Wein und neue Kleidung!"
languages.original_text: "I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich finde es unerhört, dass solch wichtige Mitglieder meiner Crew in Lumpen gekleidet sind! Gebt ihnen unverzüglich Essen, Wein und neue Kleidung!"

languages.text: "Mürettebatımın böylesine önemli bir parçası olmanıza rağmen paçavra giymeniz olacak iş değil! Derhâl yemek, şarap ve yeni giysiler verilsin!"
languages.original_text: "I find it outrageous that such important members of my crew are dressed in rags! They are to be given food, wine, and new garments immediately!"
